txt.en: In the armoury of Ashmâr-zarakh, the Orcs of Gundabad make ready their weapons of war. Many ballistae peer from its battlements, keeping watch on the gates of Gundabad below….\n\nYour mission is to destroy ballistae in Ashmâr-zarakh.
Far above the battlefield, the ballistae of Ashmâr-zarakh keep silent watch over all that would seek to breach the gates of Gundabad.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin for your reward.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have just returned from Ashmâr-zarakh. Despite our best efforts, Gorgar's forces have succeeded in positioning more ballistae above the battlefield. Unless they are destroyed, our attacks on the gates of Gundabad are doomed to fail!

'You must go to Ashmâr-zarakh and destroy those ballistae! For the Zhélruka! For the Gabil'akkâ!'
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
Your mission is to destroy ballistae in Ashmâr-zarakh.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin and travel to Ashmâr-zarakh.
'You have done well, [placeholder]!\n\n'Without those ballistae to defend the outer walls of Gundabad, we have bought ourselves time to press the attack.'
